input.description: IP address to be to be registered.
DNS server hostname or IP, in which A record will be created.
The zone in which A record will be created.
DNS server hostname orIP, in which PTR record will be created.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <operation-result> <status> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">error</xsl:text> </status> <info-message> <xsl:text></xsl:text> </info-message> <error-message> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Operation execution Unsuccessful. Reason : Check for inputs.</xsl:text> </error-message> <command-output>${cmd-op}</command-output> </operation-result> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:call-template name="reverse"> <xsl:with-param name="input" select="." /> <xsl:with-param name="delimiter" select="false()" /> </xsl:call-template> </value> </xsl:template> <template xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" name="reverse"> <param name="input" /> <param name="delimiter" select="false()" /> <choose> <when test="contains($input, '.')"> <call-template name="reverse"> <with-param name="input" select="substring-after($input, '.')" /> <with-param name="delimiter" select="true()" /> </call-template> <value-of select="substring-before($input, '.')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <if test="$delimiter"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">.</xsl:text> </if> </when> <otherwise> <value-of select="$input" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <if test="$delimiter"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">.</xsl:text> </if> </otherwise> </choose> </template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: Operation result and success boolean value
